title: Anime Review: One Piece 487
author: populationgo
description: A detailed review of Episode 487 that gave it 4 out of 5 stars, noting it was 'Another solid episode' with 'Nothing game changing, yet nothing glaringly bad' and praised its share of drama, surprises, humor, battles, and plot development. The review emphasized the episode's theme of painting the Marines in shades of gray rather than pure good.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for episode 487 and hints at episode 488

title: SHANKS STOPS THE WAR!!! - One Piece Episode 487 + 488 REACTION + REVIEW!
author: Unknown Reactor
description: A reaction and review video covering episodes 487 and 488, focusing on the dramatic conclusion of the Marineford War including Akainu's pursuit of Luffy and Shanks' arrival.

title: BLACKBEARD HAS TWO DEVIL FRUITS?? | One Piece Marineford Episode 486 AND 487 Live Reaction!
author: Unknown Reactor
description: A live reaction video covering episodes 486 and 487, focusing on Blackbeard's demonstration of two Devil Fruit powers and the climactic events at Marineford.

title: One Piece Episodes 484-488: Mother? Is That You?
author: The Going Merry: A One Piece Review Podcast
description: A podcast episode reviewing episodes 484-488 of One Piece, discussing Luffy's shocking return to Marineford and the war's climactic conclusion including Akainu's pursuit and Law's arrival.

title: One Piece – Marineford Arc (Episodes 457 – 491) Review
author: Hogan Reviews
description: A comprehensive review of the entire Marineford Arc including episode 487, analyzing the arc's themes, character development, and emotional impact.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for the entire Marineford Arc

title: The 10 Best Episodes Of The Marineford Arc (According To IMDb)
author: CBR
description: An article ranking the best episodes of the Marineford Arc based on IMDb ratings, with Episode 487 receiving a 9.3 rating, highlighting the intense drama and Akainu's relentless pursuit.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for the Marineford Arc

title: "If Jimbei was struck at the same place he would have died": How Did Jimbei Survived Akainu's Magma Punch While Ace Died at Marineford
author: Fandom Wire
description: An analysis article discussing how Jinbe survived Akainu's magma punch in episode 487 while Ace died from a similar attack, explaining the differences in the attacks and the interventions that saved Jinbe.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers about Jinbe's recovery and future events

title: The 15 Worst Injuries Luffy Has Suffered in One Piece
author: Ranker
description: A ranking article listing Luffy's worst injuries throughout the series, featuring the chest wound from Akainu in episode 487 as one of the most severe injuries Luffy has ever received.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for injuries throughout the entire series
